entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:54 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
